channel.title: qt5ct-colors on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in qt5ct-colors on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: mondo-template
item.description: This generator makes a colorscheme file for qt5ct so i get a uniform look in both GTK and Qt applications. I describe this process in detail in an episode of lets linux
